casebody.data:
ASHLAND INC., a Kentucky Corporation, Plaintiff Below, Appellant,
v.
NEXEO SOLUTIONS, LLC, f/k/a TPG Accolade, LLC, a Delaware Limited Liability Company, Defendant Below, Appellee. No. 293, 2017 Supreme Court of Delaware. Submitted: January 24, 2018
Decided: January 31, 2018

AFFIRMED.
